item.description: Please join us for a walking meetup at the Ipswich River Wildlife Sanctuary in Topsfield, Mass on Saturday, March 31, 2007. We'll meet in the parking lot at 10:45 am and begin our walk at 11:00 am. The views and various wildlife are breathtaking, particularly at this time of year. It's a perfect spot for birders so if you have binnoculars bring them along. We'll all gather after the walk for lunch at Woodmans, a delightful seafood restaurant. The address is 87 Perkins Row, Topsfield, Mass. Please note there is a $1 meetup fee plus a possible entrance fee of $4. (the website is not clear as to whether or not they are charging yet since it's still "offseason".

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: Chestnut Hill Walking Group Meetup March 31, 2007
